name: climateZone
description: Number of climate zone. 0 refers to Aachen. 1-15 refer to climate zones according to DWD.

name: timeZone
description: Shift between the location's time and GMT in hours. CET would be 1.

name: albedo
description: Ground reflectance. 0 refers to 0% and 1 refers to 100%.

name: TRYYear
description: Test referece year of DWD. Possible entries are TRY2015 and TRY2045.

name: TRYType
description: Test referece conditions of DWD. Possible entries are normal, kalt, warm.
